title: MesseMap
pageTitle: MesseMap | Frame a special place for you and download it, or make a print of it !
pageDescription: The perfect website to craft an original map poster of your own! Browse the world, adjust your design, texts and colors, then download it at the resolution and filetype you want!
helper:
Welcome on MesseMap!

Navigate in the map to find the place you want to display (search bar available), then configure the map base layer and its attributes so it reflect the style you aim for your poster. You can collapse or expand the following options categories for better navigation. Finally, click on the export button and enjoy your freshly made poster!

download.title: You're poster is being prepared
download.subtitle: Please wait while the app is gathering all the required data
download.stylePrep: Preparing map style for the export...
download.tileLoad: Waiting for all map tiles to load...
download.saveToDisk: Export done. Currently saving image to disk...

credit.line1: An app proposed by Messe Basse Production (us). This website is using the Matomo analytics service ; a privacy-friendly service which complies with GDPR reglementation. This tracking service is only used by us to monitor this website's audience. No additionnal data is collected nor shared with any third-party.
credit.line2: Maps tiles are kindly made by OpenStreetMap, GeoPortail, ESRI, Stamen Design, Carto and Mapiful, under ODbL license. We are very thankful to those providers.
credit.line3: Map data is kindly provided by ESRI, i-cubed, Mapiful, USDA, USGS, AEX, GeoEye, Getmapping, Aerogrid, IGN, IGP, UPR-EGP, OpenStreetMap, Carto, Stamen Design and the GIS User Community.
credit.line4: MesseMap is licensed with GPL-3.0 open source license, and relies on libraries Leaflet, Leaflet.SmoothWheelZoom, leaflet-search html2canvas, html2canvas-proxy-nodejs and jsPDF. The source code of this app is available on the GitHub repository, any contribution of any kind is welcome!
